class.name: WatercraftPropulsion
class.brief_description: Adds a propulsion system to a [HydroRigidBody]
class.description: This can be used to add prop or jet drives, bow thrusters, or more to a [HydroRigidBody]-based watercraft. The propulsion system will only provide thrust when its origin is underwater.

members.member: The direction that the propulsion system will push the watercraft.
The location of the propulsion system.
The amount of thrust applied by the propulsion system.
